Articles.Content: I'm having a problem with the Spaceplane Hangar and Rovers. I slapped together a simple rover in the Hangar with the Probodobodyne RoveMate, the Mk1 Command Pod, the RoveMax Model M1 wheels, and the Pegasus 1 Mobility Enhancer. When I launched it, everything disappeared. The rover, the Sun, Kerbin, the Space Center, everything. All I can see is the space-y background now. I've tried exiting and reloading, deleting my save file, loading quicksaves, etc. but found out that the only way to fix the issue so far is to delete all the game's folders. And I really don't want to have to do that again, as I've got a bunch of flights in progress that I'm not exactly keen on losing. Any help would be appreciated.
Hi sillyforth, please see here
